sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le savoir, c'est le pouvoir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Knowledge is power.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 不客气，这是我应该做的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bú kèqi, zhè shì wǒ yīnggāi zuò de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: De rien, c'est ce que je devais faire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You're welcome, it's what I should do.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis assis à côté de lui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I sit next to him.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ de shǒujī méi diàn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon téléphone est déchargé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My phone is out of battery.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mon petit frère a quinze ans cette année.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My younger brother is fifteen years old this year.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette chambre est très propre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This room is very clean.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zǎofàn wǒ chī le liǎng gè jīdàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai mangé deux œufs au petit-déjeuner.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I ate two eggs for breakfast.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shàngkè de shíhou bú yào shuōhuà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne parle pas pendant le cours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't talk during class.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ fēicháng xǐhuan zhè bù diànyǐng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime beaucoup ce film.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I really like this movie.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他一边吃饭一边看电视。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yìbiān chīfàn yìbiān kàn diànshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il mange tout en regardant la télévision.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He eats while watching TV.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est assis entre nous.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He sits between us.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez répondre à ma question.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please answer my question.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zuìhòu, wǒ xiǎng shuō xièxie dàjiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Enfin, je voudrais remercier tout le monde.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Finally, I want to say thank you all.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je bois du lait chaque matin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I drink milk every morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Lève-toi vite, tu vas être en retard !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Get up quick, you'll be late!

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Déjeunons ensemble à midi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's eat lunch together at noon.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pékin est la capitale de la Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Beijing is the capital of China.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'année dernière, je suis allé en Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Last year I went to China.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa fille est très jolie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Her daughter is very beautiful.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ma grande sœur étudie à l'université.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: My older sister studies at university.
